events.description: Copper fell approximately 1% to $6 per pound on Wednesday due to rising inventories.
Copper rose nearly 5% on Tuesday, marking its best one-day gain since November 2022.
Glencore agreed to sell 40% of its stakes in two African copper operations to a US government-backed group.
